pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - PlayPro Casino Equipment 18+ PlayPro Email playpro@gmail.com Phone +61-8-8956-0984 Loncation Erldunda Desert Oaks Resort Stuart Hwy &, Lasseter Hwy, Ghan NT 0872, Australia PlayPro Home They choose us Range Prodigable products Obligation Privacy Policy Social Media Features Our website may incorporate social media functionalities, such as the Facebook "Like" button or widgets like the "Share This" button. These features may collect your IP address, the specific page you are visiting on our site, and may set cookies to facilitate their proper functionality. These social media features and widgets may be hosted either by a third party or directly on our website. Your interactions with these features are governed by the privacy policy of the company providing them. Referrals If you opt to use our referral service to inform a friend about our website or products, we will request your friend's name and email address. We will send your friend a one-time email inviting them to visit the site. We retain this information solely for sending the one-time email and monitoring the success of our referral program. Data Security We implement reasonable and appropriate measures to safeguard your personal information from loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction, considering the risks involved and the nature of the information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, while we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. If you have any concerns about security on our website, please contact us at playpro@gmail.com. Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. To determine the appropriate retention period for personal information, we consider the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the data, the potential risk of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure of your data, the purposes for which we process your data, and whether we can achieve those purposes through other means. In some cases, we may anonymize your personal information for research or statistical purposes, in which case we may use this information indefinitely without further notice. Data Controller and Data Processor PlayPro acts as the data controller for personal information collected through our website. A "data controller" is responsible for determining how and why personal information is processed. We may engage third-party service providers to assist in operating our business and website or to perform services on our behalf, such as sending newsletters or conducting surveys. We may share your information with these third parties solely for those purposes. In certain situations, we may act as a data processor. A "data processor" processes personal information on behalf of a data controller. We may process personal information as a data processor when providing services to our customers. Do Not Track Signals Some web browsers may transmit "do not track" signals to websites and online services with which the browser communicates. There is currently no standard for how websites should respond to these signals. At this time, we do not take action in response to these signals. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at playpro@gmail.com. We will do our best to address your concerns and respond to your requests in a timely manner.
